de.devbliss.apitester

Class TestState

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.devbliss.apitester.TestState

  • public class TestState
extends Object
    Currently, this only holds an instance of HttpClient. Use the same instance of this e.g. if you need to make a sequence of HTTP calls and want the state (mostly cookies) to be remembered for all calls.
    Author:
    hschuetz

    • Method Detail

      • getCookie

        public Cookie getCookie(String name)
        Get the cookie with the given name, if one can be found. Note, it is possible that there might be multiple cookies with the same name, this will just return the first one found.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the cookie
        Returns:
        The cookie, or null if no cookie is found

      • getCookieValue

        public String getCookieValue(String name)
        Get the value of the cookie with the given name, if one can be found. Note, it is possible that there might be multiple cookies with the same name, this will just return the first one found.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the cookie
        Returns:
        The value of the cookie, or null if no cookie with that name was found

      • getCookies

        public List<Cookie> getCookies()
        Get all the cookies in the cookie store.
        Returns:
        All of the cookies in the cookie store.

      • addCookie

        public void addCookie(Cookie cookie)
        Add a cookie to the cookie store.
        Parameters:
        cookie - The cookie to add.

      • clearCookies

        public void clearCookies()
        Clear all the cookies from the store.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shutdown, closing any active HTTP connections
